Articles.Content: Sup, just letting you know in advance I really suck at making introduction posts interesting. So I found this game back in August when I mis-clicked a YouTube link. Best. Mistake. EVAR! Watched a couple of videos on it and was hooked. So a little about me. I am a senior in high school. I am going to the local community college when I get out of school and taking the first responder courses and getting a job at the local fire station. Eventually I would like to work for NASA, assuming they still exist in the next 20 years. Anyway KSP is pretty amazing and I definitely want to be an active part of it\'s community. Thanks for reading!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Welcome to the forums!

Hope you don\'t fail as much as me!

JupiterII
